data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces Submitting of Proposed Readoption of Emergency Regulations and Public Comment Period
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) announced today that it has submitted the proposed readoption of emergency regulations for commercial medicinal and adult-use cannabis to the Office of Administrative Law (OAL).
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
